Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Staff = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso local vPlayer
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local staffDamage = 17
local orb = Instance.new("Part") orb.FormFactor = 3 orb.Shape = "Block" orb.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) orb.CanCollide = false orb.Transparency = 0.0
local orbMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") orbMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=66877034" orbMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68915275" orbMesh.Parent = orb orbMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
local orbFire = Instance.new("Fire") orbFire.Color = Color3.new(102/255, 0, 204/255) orbFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 0, 204/255) orbFire.Parent = orb orbFire.Size = 2.0 orbFire.Heat = 2.0
local bg local slowCo = nil
local torsoFrame = {} local darknessSound
local abyss = Tool:FindFirstChild("Abyss") while abyss == nil do wait() abyss = Tool:FindFirstChild("Abyss") end
local firePart = Staff:FindFirstChild("FirePart") local storeWeld = Staff:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") while storeWeld == nil or firePart == nil do firePart = Staff:FindFirstChild("FirePart") storeWeld = Staff:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") wait() end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function cyclone() if myTorso == nil then return end
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoFrame[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoFrame[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 60 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg then bg.cframe = torsoFrame[c] end wait() end if bg then bg:Remove() end end
function staffUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function staffDown() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1 , 0) end
function destroyEverything() local sign = 1 local missiles = {} abyss = Tool:FindFirstChild("Abyss") if abyss and abyss.Value == true then vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
laughSound = Staff:FindFirstChild("Laugh") if laughSound then laughSound:Play() end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 local initDirection = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(cyclone))
staffDown()
for i = 1, 40 do local direction local num = i%30 if num == 0 then direction = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector else direction = CFrame.Angles(0, (num-1) * sign * math.pi/20, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector end local spawnPos = (Staff.Position - Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)) + direction * 4.0 sign = sign * -1
missiles[i] = orb:Clone() missiles[i].CFrame = (CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction)) missiles[i].Velocity = direction * 70.0 missiles[i].RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, missiles[i]:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity, 0) floatForce.Parent = missiles[i]
missiles[i].Parent = game.Workspace
missiles[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missiles[i], hit, 4) end) debris:AddItem(missiles[i], 1.25) end -- wait(0.75) staffUp() if bg then bg:Remove() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 wait(30.0) abyss.Value = false end end
function pierce(missile, hit, dmg) local humanoid if missile then if hit.Parent and hit then if hit:IsA("Accessory") then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) if dmg then humanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) else humanoid:TakeDamage(staffDamage) end if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("DarknessScript") == nil then local cloneScript = Tool.DarknessScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent cloneScript.Disabled = false end end end end end
function shoot(direction) vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = Staff.Position + direction * 4.0
local missile = orb:Clone() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) missile.Velocity = direction * 90.0 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity, 0) floatForce.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missile, hit) end)
debris:AddItem(missile, 5) end
function staffUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function staffDown() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0.848, 0.53) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -0.53, 0.848) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Staff.Position).unit staffDown() shoot(direction)
wait(0.9) staffUp()
darknessSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("DarknessSound")
wait(3.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if storeWeld then local reWeld = storeWeld:Clone() reWeld.Parent = Staff end end
function onUnequipped() if darknessSound then darknessSound:Stop() end firePart = Staff:FindFirstChild("FirePart") storeWeld = Staff:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
abyss.Changed:connect(destroyEverything)

local Tool = script.Parent local Staff = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local firePart = Staff:FindFirstChild("FirePart") local storeWeld = Staff:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") while storeWeld == nil or firePart == nil do firePart = Staff:FindFirstChild("FirePart") storeWeld = Staff:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") wait() end
function choiceIsYours(key) if vCharacter == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end key = key:lower() if key == "q" then print("Q") abyss = Tool:FindFirstChild("Abyss") if abyss and abyss.Value == false then abyss.Value = true end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(choiceIsYours) end if storeWeld then local reWeld = storeWeld:Clone() reWeld.Parent = Staff end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

local vCharacter = script.Parent
local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local playerGui
local sg local frame local darknessImg
local duration = 2.5
if vPlayer then playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("DarknessGui") == nil then sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "DarknessGui" sg.Parent = playerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "DarknessFrame" frame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 frame.Parent = sg
darknessImg = Instance.new("ImageLabel") darknessImg.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68915275" darknessImg.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 darknessImg.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) darknessImg.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) darknessImg.Parent = frame
while duration > 0 do duration = duration - wait() wait() end
if sg then sg:Remove() end wait(2.5) script:Remove() end end
wait(2.0) if script then script:Remove() end
